GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
media: solo6x10: fix possible memory leak in solo_sysfs_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 83d4b1ae98a47a739fa5241300b86eb1110d5d63, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit dcae5dacbce518513abf7776cb450b7bd95d722b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: solo6x10: fix possible memory leak in solo_sysfs_init()
